complaints.summary: Next.js build fails because client route imports server-only module
complaints.details: npm run build aborts when Next.js detects src/ai/flows/analyze-form-data.ts importing server-only. That module is included via DocumentFlow in the client-rendered generate page, so the production bundle fails.
complaints.next_action: Refactor or relocate the analyze-form-data flow so client routes no longer depend on a server-only module, restoring the production build.

history.note: Complaint logged by Complaints pod; build logs stored at ops/artifacts/complaints-cycle-0001/build-error.txt.

complaints.summary: Home route 500s because DocumentDiscoveryModal fails to compile
complaints.details: Multiple requests to /en and / return 500 responses after the new discovery modal refactor. Next.js reports `Unexpected token `Dialog`` for src/components/global/DocumentDiscoveryModal.tsx around the Dialog wrapper, so the server cannot compile the component. See home-500-log.txt for the full stack, including repeated 500s during page load.
complaints.next_action: Restore a compiling version of DocumentDiscoveryModal (e.g., adjust the Dialog usage or roll back) so /en loads without 500 errors.

history.note: Complaint logged by Complaints pod; evidence captured at ops/artifacts/complaints-cycle-0002/home-500-log.txt.
Captured repeated GET / 500s and user report of slow/broken navigation; see home-requests-latency.txt for timings.
Homepage runtime error still blocks link validation; see ops/artifacts/complaints-cycle-0002/link-check-blocked.json.
